results.title: Prevention of atherosclerosis by specific AT1-receptor blockade with candesartan cilexetil.
results.text_hl: In the first set of experiments, 12 @<m>DISEASE_Familial_Primary_Pulmonary_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065627 @@@WHHL@@@ @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ were randomly assigned to three groups: placebo, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ 5 mg/kg daily or @CHEMICAL_candesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C081643 @@@candesartan@@@ 2 mg/kg daily for six months.

citations.NLM: Papademetriou V, Mammillot P, Redman R, Notargiacomo A, Narayan P, Lakshman R. Prevention of atherosclerosis by specific AT1-receptor blockade with candesartan cilexetil. J Renin Angiotensin Aldosterone Syst. 2001 Mar;2(1_suppl):S77-S80. PMID: 28095228
